name: Eden Team Turban [1] Blueprint
description: Hat exclusively for the Eden Team members. The design matches well with the uniform.

name: Egg and Bacon
description: The golden poached eggs and bacon are really delicious! [Author: Zhou Ba]

name: Eggshell
description: Very hard eggshell used to wear on the head as a decoration.

name: Eggshell Biu[1]
description: "Biu! Biu!" It seems to think you are its mother.
effect: Dmg Reduc. ＋5%,Equip it to gain Eggshell's protection: Protect all the equipments from being broken.

name: Eggshell Blueprint
description: Very hard eggshell used to wear on the head as a decoration.

name: Eggshell [1]
description: Very hard eggshell used to wear on the head as a decoration.

name: Elder's Hammer [1]
description: The top of the hammer is decorated with orb made from the teeth of seven venomous snakes, and ordinary armor is corroded whenever it is touched.
effect: STR ＋4,For Refining ＋1, the damage of [Acid Demonstration] ＋5%, Damage of [Acid Terror] ＋2%, skill multiplier of [Improved Acid Demonstration] ＋30%

name: Elder's Hammer [2]
description: The top of the hammer is decorated with orb made from the teeth of seven venomous snakes, and ordinary armor is corroded whenever it is touched.
effect: STR ＋4,For Refining ＋1, the damage of [Acid Demonstration] ＋5%, Damage of [Acid Terror] ＋2%, skill multiplier of [Improved Acid Demonstration] ＋30%

name: Elegant Christmas Chest
description: The package received by completing chest quest in Gingerbread City. Open it to find Snowman, Edelweiss and other materials, with a large probability to find normal Blueprint.

name: Element Alloy
description: Raw materials used for making various immunity alloy.

name: Element Card
description: Falling from the waving wings of elemental elves, the light dust fell on the ordinary cards and then brought them strong affinity power. The power can be injected into the adventurer's soul through the power of Valkyrie, which will make adventurers preferred by elements.

name: Elemental Sword [2]
description: A magic sword with four Attributes Str. It can cause very strong damage to the enemies with Neutral Attributes.

name: Elemental Sword [3]
description: A magic sword with four Attributes Str. It can cause very strong damage to the enemies with Neutral Attributes.
